mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our Mission is to fully recreate Austria, Switzerland and Liechtenstein at a scale in the video game Minecraft. One block in Minecraft equates to roughly one metre in the real world, meaning that this project will fully recreate the size of our countries. Anyone is able to join us as Builder and contribute to the largest and most expansive build project to ever have been attempted in Minecraft, lead by the head organisation Build the Earth.

server.title: Our Server
server.description: Once you join our server network with the IP mc.alps-bte.com in the Minecraft version 1.12.2-1.17 you spawn at the "Hub" our lobby. You have two options: Either you want to start building right away and therefore join the "Plot System" or you decide to visit already built areas by joining the "Terra Server". The "Plot System" is the easiest and fastest way to apply as an official Alps BTE Builder. If you are accepted into the Build Team as a Builder, you can build.

how.title: How we do it
how.description: Our Key tool is the free messenger Discord. We use it for coordinating the project and for communication between our members. It is the way to go if you want to learn more about what we are doing, getting help or keeping up with current build developments. For building on the open-world "Terra Server" we use a modpack - a modification of the game - which gets rid of the hight limitation of Minecraft and generates the terrain, Furthermore, it

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.description: This page shows a collection of some of our building efforts. The content will be updated continuously. High resolution pictures for news coverage can be found in "Downloads"

downloads.title: Downloads
downloads.description: To support journalists in their work, we have made official press photos and information on Alps BTE available here for download. You are welcome to use this information for non-commercial publications without contacting us. Editorial use is permitted. In case of publication, we kindly request that a proof copy be sent to our press office.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Here you can find frequently asked questions about Alps BTE and the tools we use.

application.title: Application
application.description: This is an overview on how to become a "Builder" - a member of our build team. For further information join our Discord. If you want an in-depth explanation on how to apply, watch our tutorial video down below.

discord.title: Discord
discord.description: We use Discord for coordinating the project and for communication between our members. Download the free messenger and join our Alps BTE Discord-Server by clicking here. Read through the information channels to get used to the project and get in touch with our community.

plotSystem.title: Plot System
plotSystem.description: Wir nutzen Discord zur Koordination des Projekts und zur Kommunikation zwischen unseren Mitgliedern. Laden Sie den kostenlosen Messenger herunter und treten Sie unserem Alps BTE Discord-Server bei, indem Sie hier klicken. Lesen Sie die Informationskanäle durch, um sich an das Projekt zu gewöhnen und mit unserer Community in Kontakt zu treten.

applicationForm.title: Application Form
applicationForm.description: Go to buildtheearth.net/buildteams and search for Alps BTE. Click "Apply" and fill out the form. Add the IDs of your constructed plots so that we can confirm you are able to build in BTE. For starting off we highly recommend our Builders Guide series on our YouTube channel which covers every aspect of building in BTE.

becomingBuilder.title: Becoming a Builder
becomingBuilder.description: Once you have sent off your form it will be reviewed in less than 48 hours by one of our Reviewers. Meanwhile you can download the official Modpack - a modification of the game - that is crucial for building on the open-world "Terra Server". If you have been accepted into the team you get the "Builder" role and all its rights on our Discord- and Minecraftserver. On the "Terra Server" you are now free to build wherever you want in Austria, Switzerland and Liechtenstein.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Alps BTE is an independent subsidiary organisation of Build The Earth. It was founded in March 2020 and aims to recreate Austria, Switzerland and Liechtenstein at a 1:1 scale in the block game Minecraft.
